page.title: 05SMITE
page.content: Smite is a farming area, containing three farms. These are called{Lower {Smite Farm, Robins Acre Dairy Farm and{The Woodlands. Wychavon District Council has bought Lower Smite from the owner of The Woodlands in order to turn it into a refuse tip. This has caused contoversy in the past,and may do so again on ecological grounds.The Martin Buildings were once the laundry for what was{Hindlip Hall.}There are three buildings.The first was used for washing,the second for ironing and the third was used for airing.Over the road are Hindlip stables they were built in 1910 and were recently restored,and turned into a house.
